org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.impl

Class MetricsSourceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.impl.MetricsSourceAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicMBean

     class MetricsSourceAdapter
extends Object
implements DynamicMBean
    An adapter class for metrics source and associated filter and jmx impl
